<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby Custom Shopify Storefront for Simmons Gun Repair
</h1>

Commissioned as a freelance project, I've designed and built this e-commerce website using GatsbyJS, Styled components and Tailwind CSS for the front end, with the Shopify Storefront API as a headless CMS.
